H0.text: where was uncle tom 's cabin first published. The Atlantic Monthly

H1.text: where was uncle tom 's cabin first published. The New York Tribune

H2.text: where was uncle tom 's cabin first published. Harper's Weekly

H3.text: where was uncle tom 's cabin first published. The National Era

A4.text: Uncle Tom's Cabin first appeared as a 40-week serial in The National Era, an abolitionist periodical, starting with the June 5, 1851, issue.
